welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kadena, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its rich culture and beautiful beaches. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kadena has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kadena AB Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kadena AB Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after completing a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Naha Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iejima Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iejima Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
